steps.step: Cut the mozzarella into small-ish pieces. Grate the parmesan. Set both aside.

Make the Dressing: In the base of a large mixing bowl, whisk together the Dijon mustard, both vinegars, the lemon juice, as well as a pinch of sea salt and black pepper. Stir in the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Set the bowl aside.
Cut the head of radicchio in half, and then slice each half thinly, so as to shred the lettuce. Chiffonade the basil leaves.

Now its time to build the pizza. You will bake one at a time, so use half of each ingredient set per pizza. Start by brushing the dough with the garlic-red pepper oil. Then, scatter on the snap peas, the spring onions, themozzarella, and the parmesan. Its wise to move the pizza onto the pizza stone before you crack an egg into the center.
Bake the pizza just long enough for the egg white to set, about 5 minutes. While the pizza is baking, toss the radicchio and basil with the dressing.1
When the pizza comes out of the oven, finish it with a sprinkle of sea salt, a crack of black pepper, and some lemon zest. Top with theradicchio-basil salad, and serve immediately.

ingredients.original: 1 tablespoon champagne vinegar (white wine vinegar works, too)
